name: .RBA File Extension
summary: Learn about .RBA files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can use Harmonix Magma (Windows) to transfer an RBA file to the Xbox 360 versions of Rock Band 2 and 3. To do so, refer to the documentation linked below.
You can also open an RBA file with Magma C3 and Onyx Music Game Toolkit.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
